thread.title: Very good location to visit Paris and Disney with a super team caring clients 24/24
thread.title_full: Very good location to visit Paris and Disney with a super team caring clients 24/24 - Review of Novotel Paris Les Halles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PhilippeV34
title: Very good location to visit Paris and Disney with a super team caring clients 24/24
text:
we're used to say in this Novotel because it's just a great place :
located downtown at a walking distance to major museums ans sites
RER and tube et 5mn walk
very client focus staff caring 7/7
nice rooms and junior suites ( with views on Aris)
Just great .
